vsParam:
Mmm... The medicines are all in place...
But the situation is not good.

Boo-hoo, this is a foul!
A powerful monster just occupies the main road!

We'll miss the deadline of the
commission if we go round it...

Bergamot Sensei, what should we do?
Everyone's effort will be in vain!
How about I go kill that monster?

What!? Mimi!?
W, what's going on with you?

I can't help here as I am not
good at alchemy. In this case...

Killing that monster is my duty as a "comrade".
Am I right?
Mimi, you just admit you are our "comrade"!
I am so touched... My eyes start to get wet...

I, I didn't get it clear!
It's "comrade" in playing house!

W, what? Is it worth crying?
Gee, so emotional...

It's natural for me to do that as an aristocrat,
and this is related to the reputation of the Schwarzlang family.

Besides... It's also one of the
activities of playing house as a "comrade".

Darn it! You are in a hurry, right? I'll go kill that monster now.
[px], follow me closely!

It must be the monster blocking our way!
Wow... It does seem strong!
There's nothing to be afraid of since I am here!

I must kill it as fast as I can so that they can deliver the
medicines on time!

Guys! Mimi has struck down the monster!
Mimi, thank you!

Great! We can finally deliver the medicines!
Mimi, thank you so much!

No, no need to thank me.
I just did something an aristocrat should.

Hey, Mimi!
Just be our "comrade", okay?

"With the inherent identity, an aristocrat must act
noble and decent, and be respected by everyone."

That's how my late mother taught me.
So I always bear in mind the obligations of being an aristocrat.
"An aristocrat must act noble and decent"...

I must guard the reputation of the Schwarzlang family.
So, I have no time to envy the so called "comrades" here.

But, you are not the only person in the Schwarzlang family, right?
A family's reputation cannot be guarded only by one person.

And you'll get tired one day
if you always work so hard for that goal.

Of course. Mimi, your mother didn't
do it all by herself, right?

So, why don't you be our "comrade",
and we can help each other?

... Let me think about it.
If you insist, I'll consider it.
